data.name: Robocraft - High Flyers Bundle
data.detailed_description:
The High Flyers Bundle is a great way to get a flying start in Robocraft. In this pack you will receive, multiple cosmetics, speedometer, altimeter, 30 days of Premium membership and 3,000 Cosmetic Credits that can be used to buy cosmetic items in-game.

The complete list of items featured in the High Flyers Pack is listed below:

  • 3,000 Cosmetic Credits. Cosmetic Credits can be used in the Item Shop to buy cosmetic parts and other customisation options to make your Robots stand out from the crowd.
  • 30 Days of Premium membership - doubles the rate of experience level progression and gives you more paint colours to use on your Robots.
  • Speedometer to track the speed of a robot
  • Altimeter to track the altitude of a robot
  • Twin Vapor Trail which leaves a trail behind a robot
  • Complete Eagle Robot Mask cosmetic

Please note, the robots featured in the above promotional shots are not included in this bundle. After purchase the contents of this pack will be awarded on next log-in via Steam.

data.short_description: The High Flyers Bundle is a great way to get a flying start in Robocraft. In this pack you will receive, multiple cosmetics, speedometer, altimeter, 30 days of Premium membership and 3,000 Cosmetic Credits that can be used to buy cosmetic items in-game.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 2000/XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel dual core or better with SSE2 support or equivilent AMD family
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 Compatible GPU, DirectX 9.0c
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Min resolution 1024x768

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: Intel dual core or better with SSE2 support or equivalent AMD family
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 Compatible GPU
  • Additional Notes: Min resolution 1024x768

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: Intel dual core or better with SSE2 support or equivilent AMD family
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 Compatible GPU
  • Additional Notes: Min resolution 1024x768
